description:
All the kings are dead... except one. Onion Force is a hybrid Action Adventure/Tower Defense game featuring 30 levels of butt-puckering mayhem!

Use cunning and strategy to strengthen your team chosen from a diverse cast of characters, and hang onto your seat as you try to save the last king from his impending doom.

Make intelligent choices, collect gold, onions, and equipment, and strategically build towers that will be the most effective for the threat at hand.

Decimate evil through an array of terrain, weather conditions, destructible environments and utter chaos to ultimately find the source of all this nonsense!

FEATURES:
- Three playable heroes with their own unique abilities
- 30 expansive levels set across six different locations
- Thousands of items to collect and equip
- Eight different tower types to create
- Collectable onions to trade for a variety of power-ups
- Stellar cartoon graphics and animation
name: Onion Force
